postgresql.bgwriter.duration.description: Total time spent writing and syncing files to disk by checkpoints.

postgresql.bgwriter.maxwritten.description: Number of times the background writer stopped a cleaning scan because it had written too many buffers.

postgresql.blks_hit.description: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache.

postgresql.blks_read.description: Number of disk blocks read in this database.

postgresql.connection.max.description: Configured maximum number of client connections allowed

postgresql.function.calls.description: The number of calls made to a function. Requires `track_functions=pl|all` in Postgres config.

postgresql.index.scans.description: The number of index scans on a table.

postgresql.index.size.description: The size of the index on disk.

postgresql.operations.description: The number of db row operations.

postgresql.replication.data_delay.description: The amount of data delayed in replication.

postgresql.rows.description: The number of rows in the database.

postgresql.table.count.description: Number of user tables in a database.

postgresql.table.size.description: Disk space used by a table.

postgresql.table.vacuum.count.description: Number of times a table has manually been vacuumed.

postgresql.temp.io.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries.

postgresql.tup_deleted.description: Number of rows deleted by queries in the database.

postgresql.tup_fetched.description: Number of rows fetched by queries in the database.

postgresql.tup_inserted.description: Number of rows inserted by queries in the database.

postgresql.tup_returned.description: Number of rows returned by queries in the database.

postgresql.tup_updated.description: Number of rows updated by queries in the database.

postgresql.wal.age.description: Age of the oldest WAL file.

postgresql.wal.delay.description: Time between flushing recent WAL locally and receiving notification that the standby server has completed an operation with it.

postgresql.wal.lag.description: Time between flushing recent WAL locally and receiving notification that the standby server has completed an operation with it.
